About

Hi mate,

My name is Paulo Leonardo Benatto (aka patito) and I’m from south Brazil. Currently I’m living in the craziest city in the Uk, Brighton. What I’m doing here? Open pan popcorn, traveling, learning English, meeting people, drinking pints and making bugs in the old continent.

I started my life in England working as busser (waiter assistant) in London, good times, but now I’m back to the dark side, making memory leaks. /o\

Currently I’m working at Brandwatch on IT team. Both are amazing, the company and my team. I’m Jr. Sysadmin and the most of my time I’m automating tasks using Python, uWSGI, Nginx (with SSL) on Debian servers. But sometimes I work with Nagios and other admin tasks.

As Open Source developer attending in projects like: libmalelf, malelf and libpenetra. All projects were developed in C language on Linux platform in order to analyze Linux and Windows binaries files.

Career

  • September 2014 - Today

    Linux Systems Administrator @ Brandwatch. Every day I work with Debian Linux Servers, Python, Backups, Ansible and much more fun. =D

  • December 2013 - March 2014

    Software Engineer Freelancer @ DBA. Worked in a Parking Meter System project. More C and Python coding.

  • December 2012 - December 2013

    Software Engineer @ SEC+. Developed security softwares to analyze linux binaries.

  • September 2008 - December 2012

    Working as Software Engineer at Digitro. Developed a lot C Softwares to VoIP area.

  • January 2008 - September 2008

    My first job was at VOffice, as Jr. Software Engineer. Working with Linux and Asterisk.

  • January 2002 - December 2007

    Learning Pascal :D @ Unioeste BSc. Computer Science
